original_text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews, he proceeded further to take Peter also. (Then were the days of unleavened bread.)
korean_text: 유대인들이 이 일을 기뻐하는 것을 보고 베드로도 잡으려 할새 때는 무교절 기간이라

sentences.original_text: And because he saw it pleased the Jews
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그것이 유대인들을 기쁘게 하는 것을 보았으므로

sentences.original_text: Then were the days of unleavened bread
